snippet.title: Colecovision - The Dukes of Hazzard - Skill 1
snippet.description: Me playing The Dukes of Hazzard on the Colecovision. It's really tough to play this emulated, as you need to accelerate and change gears with the keyboard while steering with the mouse. If only I had three hands! This is skill 1, which is the easiest of the 4. The aim is to chase down Jeremiah Stinge's blue car while avoiding Boss Hogg's white car. The graphics are really impressive for 1984. The physics...not so much.
